summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to telecommunications; authorizing the Department of Administrative Services and the City Light Department to enter into an inter-agency agreement with other governmental entities to participate in a project to share fiber optic cable; increasing the expenditure allowance in the 1996 budget of the Department of Administrative Services; and allowing the Department of Administrative Services to receive reimbursement from the other agencies participating in the project for the costs attributable to them; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
